patterns: Can you tell me about ESCEP?
responses: ESCEP is the best IT school, offering excellent programs in IT and computer science. Located in Niamey, ESCEP is renowned for its top-tier education in information technology.

patterns: How long have you been around?
responses: I don't have an age like humans do, but I've been around for a while.
Age doesn't really apply to me, but I’m constantly learning new things!
I was created to assist, and I've been learning since then!
I'm ageless, but I'm always getting smarter!

patterns: Can you tell me your name?
responses: I'm your helpful chatbot.
You can call me your virtual assistant.
I am a chatbot created to help you.
I don't have a specific name, but I'm here to assist!

patterns: Can I talk to you anytime?
responses: I'm available 24/7 to assist you.
You can reach me anytime. I'm always here to help!
I'm here to help you no matter the time of day.
I work around the clock, so feel free to ask anytime.

patterns: Do you have a joke for me?
responses: Why don’t programmers like nature? It has too many bugs.
Why do Java developers wear glasses? Because they don’t C#.
Why was the JavaScript developer sad? Because they didn’t know how to 'null' their feelings.
Why did the computer show up at work late? It had a hard drive!
I can't give you the weather right now, but you can check a weather app!
I don't have real-time weather updates, but it might be sunny somewhere!
I can't check the weather, but it's always a good day to code!

patterns: Can you tell me something surprising?
responses: Did you know that the first computer bug was a moth stuck in a computer?
Here's a fun fact: The first computer virus was created in 1983!
Did you know that over 90% of the world's data was generated in the last two years?
Here's an interesting one: The first 1 GB hard drive, introduced in 1980, weighed over 500 pounds!
Imrane Yaye is the delegate of the Artificial Intelligence section at ESCEP and is also the villain.
Moubarak is the best student at ESCEP; he comes to school every day. He is a wonderful person.
